summary: The diff comprehensively implements all 11 requirements from the BuildRequest. Key implementations include: fixed Add Sale localStorage persistence (REQ-22), Today's Sales counter updates (REQ-23), flexible form validation (REQ-24), simplified Bangladesh flag-inspired theme colors (REQ-25), redesigned Quick Actions section (REQ-26), improved bilingual splash screen tagline (REQ-27), and complete Timer/Reminder feature system with toggle (REQ-28), Dynamic Island-style display (REQ-29), modal interface (REQ-30), browser notifications (REQ-31), and real-time countdown (REQ-32). All changes are frontend-only with localStorage persistence and proper Bangla/English language support.
